result.execSummary:
The defendant Kristopher G Heiman was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Child Abuse-Fail/Prevent Bodily Harm, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.03(4)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: $268 to be paid by the defendant to the Clerk of Courts office within 60 days.  $250 DNA surcharge remitted.  Court authorized payment plan.

Def to comply with all CHIPS orders & conditions & cooperate with DHS. Def to complete parenting classes.  Defendant shall complete a risk and needs assessment and comply with care plan goals related to prioritized need areas identified.  Any other conditions DOC, Probation/Parole Department may impose.  Defendant advised of requirement to provide DNA sample. Previously provided per DCSO. No objection to early termination of probation after 3 years if def has completed all conditions of probation with no violations, ATRs or new charges to level of probable cause.

supervisions.notes:
No objection to early termination of probation after 3 yrs if Def has completed all conditions of probation with no violations, ATR's or new charges to level of probable cause. 
2/15/16 Crt orders JOC to be amended F/W to reflect 3 yrs probation with same conditions as ordered at sentencing on 1/21/16. Crt also amends offense date to 12/14/14 from 12/1/14.

Reporter:  digital recorder - 1:53
  Def waived reading of Information.  Def by Counsel enters a plea of NG.  Motions due w/i 20 days; bail continued.

Defendant in court with Attorney David J.W. Klauser.  Diane Louise Schlipper appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing signed.

Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release.
  - Defendant shall complete the booking/fingerprinting process if required.
  - Defendant shall abide by all Orders issued by Juvenile Court and Dane Co Dept of Human Services.
Defendant waived the time limits for Preliminary Hearing.
Trial judge -  Br 15

ADDRESS INFO for Kristopher G Heiman
Current: 301 1/2 S Concord Ave, Watertown, WI 53704   (Effective: 11-12-2015)
Prior: 301 S Concord Ave, Watertown, WI 53704

Defendant appeared.  Tim Helmberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The defendant received a copy of the Complaint and waived reading.  Defendant stood mute.  Court entered not guilty plea as to any misdemeanor counts.  Status conference scheduled for November 30, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
